body_html:
This Windows issue is complete bs. It's complaining about OptionalBase<T> not being a base class of optional, even though optional inherits from OptionalBase<T>. It's invoking this constructor https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/aten/src/ATen/optional.h#L344

@peterjc123 could you poke around to see what might be the issue here?
body_text:
This Windows issue is complete bs. It's complaining about OptionalBase<T> not being a base class of optional, even though optional inherits from OptionalBase<T>. It's invoking this constructor https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/aten/src/ATen/optional.h#L344
@peterjc123 could you poke around to see what might be the issue here?
body:
This Windows issue is complete bs. It's complaining about `OptionalBase<T>` not being a base class of `optional`, even though `optional` inherits from `OptionalBase<T>`. It's invoking this constructor https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/aten/src/ATen/optional.h#L344 

@peterjc123 could you poke around to see what might be the issue here?
